title: Vilnius Inner-City Retreat Overlooking Vingis Park Near Old Town
description: Be swept away by lush parklands, medieval Gothic and neoclassical architecture and the infectious energy of Vilnius with a stay at Crowne Plaza Vilnius, an IHG Hotel. Set next to Vingis Park, close to the Neris River, explore the best of Lithuania's capital from the city centre and discover what's hidden on Old Town's historic cobblestoned pathways. Head to the 16th-floor restaurant, Horizontas, for sweeping city vistas or the lobby bar for a tipple before you head out into the golden glow of the city.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Vilnius, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: MK Ciurlionio Street 84, Vilnius LT-03100, Lithuania
